args: I propped myself up, and noticed a faint\nmedicinal smell.
Oh, that's right. I'd put a compress on my leg\nthe previous night.
I sat up straight and gently lowered that leg\nto the floor.
It wasn't enough to stop me from walking, but\nI should probably avoid putting too much\nweight on it.
It was a weekday, so I'd still have to go to\nschool... But maybe I could get the nurse's\npermission to skip gym for a couple of days.
\dSorry. Just wanted to check if you were still\nalive.\d
\dDon't say stuff like that... It'll bring bad\nluck.\d
\dHa! Sorry. Hotaru was really freaked out\nyesterday.\d
In the end, Hotaru had convinced me to let her\ncarry some of my bags back to the dorm.
The rain wasn't as bad as it could have been,\nbut it still made it hard for us to strike up\nany kind of cheery conversation.
Hotaru looked about ready to burst into tears\nthe whole time.
I assured her I was fine and lent her an\numbrella as thanks, but she must have still\nbeen worried.
\dA little. Should be fine if I take it slow\nfor a couple of days.\d
\dHotaru didn't catch a cold or anything, did\nshe?\d
\dNaw, she's fine. She took a nice long bath\nwhen she got home.\d
\dShe got into one of her thoughtful moods when\nshe drifts around like a cloud.\d
\dAnd now she's run away from home.\d
\dLike I said, she's run away from home.\d
\dI just found this thing on the table a minute\nago. Looks like some kind of letter of\nresignation.\d
I could imagine a giant cartoon question mark\npopping up above my head.
\dI, Hotaru Himegi, hereby give intention of\nnotice to leave the Himegi household. Thank\nyou for all your--\d
\dWhoa, whoa, whoa, back up a minute!\d
\d...I do not intend to return, as I must take\nresponsibility for problems I have caused.\d
\dIs this like when a businessman resigns\nbecause they messed up?\d
\dYeah, you're right. The phrasing sounds kinda\nawkward.\d
\dShe probably copied it from a bunch of\ntemplates. Formal writing was never her strong\nsuit.\d
\dYou know that's not what I mean either.\d
\dHas she really run away? How can you be so\nlaid back about it?!\d
\dDon't sweat it. I know just what she's\nthinking and where she'll go.\d
\dThe only problem is working out how long\nit'll take her to come around, and which room\nshe'll use in the meantime.\d
\dFor starters, yours is out of the question.\d
\dWait, wait. I have no idea what you're\ntalking about.\d
\dShe's gotta stay somewhere, right? And when\nshe gets like this, she pretty much needs to\nbe watched 24/7.\d
\dI feel like we're talking about two\ncompletely different things here.\d
\dShe'll probably be over there by now.\d
\dOkay, stop. That's the part I'm having\ntrouble with.\d
\dWell...it'll be easier to show you than try\nto explain it.\d
\dLook behind you. What do you see?\d
Feeling a chill run down my spine, I jerked my\nhead around.
\dUh... Just the wall. And my bike.\d
\dOkay, cool. Now turn to your right.\d
I got up and walked over to the door.
I turned the knob and slowly opened it...
She was kneeling down in a formal posture.
\dPlease pardon my inexperience. I hope we\nshall have a long and happy life together.\d
\dTake care of her for me, 'kay? I'll be over a\nlittle later.\d
That left me to deal with Hotaru on my own.
She remained motionless in the corridor.
She looked up at me, carefully keeping her\nface completely expressionless.
\dMaster Aoi, give me any order, I'll do\nanything you wish.\d
\dI'll wait on you hand and foot from morning\ntill night! I don't care how back-breaking the\nlabor gets!\d
I was finally starting to understand what was\ngoing on.
\dYou, uh...came over to help me out 'cuz you\nwere worried about my leg, right?\d
Hotaru's voice was quiet, but I could see a\nflare of determination in her cute, round\neyes.
\dHey, I'm happy for the attention and\neverything, but it's really not bad enough to\ninterfere with my day-to-day life.\d
\dI just misjudged a step yesterday, it wasn't\nanybody's fault.\d
\dThe point is, my leg's totally fine.\d
To be honest, it did still hurt a little, but\nif Hotaru knew that it would only make things\nworse.
She brought her face right up to my leg. A\nlittle too close...this was awkward...
Her head bobbed lightly as she sniffed all\naround me. She was acting like some kind of\nguard dog.
\dYeah, I put a compress on it.\d
\dA compress...so it did still hurt, then?\d
\dYeah, but that was yesterday. It's okay now,\nI promise.\d
I gave the floor a little kick to demonstrate.
I did my best to put on a brave face.
It felt like those eyes of hers were looking\nright through me.
Doesn't hurt, doesn't hurt... Maybe if I could\nconvince myself that was the truth... It's\nfine, no need for you to worry over me...
Oh great. The worse possible person to walk in\nat a moment like this.
I could already see how this was going to turn\nout, and I didn't like it...
\dWhat's up? I don't usually see you here\nwithout Ageha...\d
\dWere you staying over in Aoi's room? Whoa...\d
\dNo, no, no. Don't get the wrong idea.\d
\dNot last night, but I will from now on.\d
Kanako looked back and forth between me and\nHotaru.
As she did so, her face lit up.
A smirk started to spread across her face.
\dSounds like we have a real juicy situation\nhere.\d
\dHotaru, we've still got some time before\nbreakfast. How about you come tell me all\nabout it?\d
\dThanks. But I must remain by Aoi's side in\ncase he needs any help.\d
Hotaru's entire being seemed to quiver with a\nsense of purpose.
She sat with Kanako while I made breakfast,\nbut the whole time she never took her eyes off\nme.
Well, that kick may have been a bad idea. A\nfaint tingling pain had been spreading through\nmy whole leg since then.
Not that I was going to tell Hotaru that. She\nstill looked like she'd break into tears at\nthe slightest provocation.
If I could just convince her none of this was\nher fault and get her to go home, I could take\nmy time to properly recover.
\dNothing to see here. Go get dressed.\d
\dNo, I didn't. My leg is fine.\d
\dCome to think of it, weren't you limping a\nlittle yesterday?\d
\dYesterday was a long time ago. You'd be\nsurprised what a good night's sleep can do.\d
I turned my attention back to breakfast, more\ndesperate than ever to mask any outward signs\nof pain.
\dHey Aoi. Is your leg still in pain like you\nsaid earlier?\d
I had a feeling it was going to turn out this\nway all along, no matter what I did.
There was that look of resolve in Hotaru's\neyes again.
\dOkay, okay, it hurts just a little.\d
Maybe it would be best to just come clean and\ntell them the whole truth.
\dIt's nothing to worry about. It's on the same\nlevel as a slightly twisted ankle or\nsomething.\d
\dIt's not even worth calling an injury. It may\nbe a little uncomfortable, but it's not gonna\nstop me from walking or anything.\d
\dIt'll heal up in a couple of days. It's\nnothing for you to feel responsible for.\d
\dI won't stand in your way. Hotaru's quite a\ncatch. She can do housework, and she's real\ncute.\d
\dI mean, of course she is. She's my sister,\nafter all.\d
\dJust let her stay here. She'll get bored\neventually.\d
\dYou don't have to be that enthusiastic about\nshutting me down.\d
\dThat one. It's empty right now. Same as\nalways.\d
\dThe usual, huh? I should have known. Make\nsure you keep it clean.\d
\dHey, I think you're forgetting who's in\ncharge of this dorm.\d
\dToo late for that. Everybody uses that room.\d
\dIt's kind of exciting staying somewhere\ndifferent for a change.\d
\dShe sneaks off here every now and then during\nsummer vacation.\d
\dRelax, it's practically public knowledge. I\nthink you're the only one who didn't know.\d
\dWe girls gotta keep some secrets, right?\d
\dHey, if you can quit gossiping for a sec, how\nabout some breakfast over here?\d
\dSure. You two, we're gonna have a serious\ntalk about this later.\d
\dHere, I'll help too. We gotta earn our keep,\nright?\d
\dOkay, but ease up a little. You can let us do\nthis much.\d
Hotaru remained steadfast, determined to do\nwhat she now thought of as her 'duty.'
I hadn't seen her that serious in a long time.
Somehow, her expression was enough to silence\nmy protests.
I left the rest of the cooking to the Himegi\nsisters.
Their skills were nothing to sneeze at. And\nthey were so in sync that there was no chance\nof them getting in each other's way.
It reminded me of all those times I'd stayed\nover at their house in the old days.
Ageha was one thing, but seeing Hotaru at work\nin my kitchen was a fresh sight.
Without really meaning to, I felt my gaze\ndrawn to her.
\dJust who are you checking out, huh?\d
\dJust making sure they're doing a good job.\d
This was my territory, after all. My personal\ncastle.
And watching Hotaru's movements, she looked a\nlittle less confident than her sister.
I couldn't help feeling a little concerned.
\dThat'd be great. I'm almost finished over\nhere.\d
My eyes flitted to Hotaru's hand as she picked\nup the kitchen knife.
Hotaru gave a cute little squeak as she\ngripped the knife and got started.
She was really good at that.
\dHeheh... Don't underestimate the talent I\ncultivated in this dear sister of mine.\d
\dI thought it was your mom who taught you how\nto cook.\d
An egg slipped out of Hotaru's hand.
\dPoor Mom. Can't really blame the teacher.\d
Well, that was an abrupt change of attitude.
Before long, a fresh, appetizing meal had been\nlaid out for everyone.
Working together, Hotaru and Ageha had got the\njob done faster than I ever could.
It had been a while since someone else cooked\nfor me.
It was probably best to enjoy it while it lasted.
Hotaru sat down next to me and started waiting\non me as if it was the most natural thing in\nthe world.
\dMy arms aren't hurt, I can feed myself just\nfine.\d
Whoops. I think I hurt her feelings there.
\dI can't believe you, turning up the chance to\nget lovey dovey with such a cute girl!\d
\dLike you care! You just want to make fun of\nme.\d
\dOkay, but ease up a little. It was a nice\nthought, just take it as a compliment.\d
\dYou look like you're enjoying this too. And\nwhere did that camera come from?\d
\dDon't you want a commemorative photo? It'll\nbe something to show the grandkids.\d
\dYeah, don't crush a young maiden's heart.\d
Man, today was really taking it out of me, and\nit was still only morning.
Hotaru trotted along beside me, full of that\n'dutiful' expression that was fast becoming\nher signature.
With her came Kanako, who wasn't even trying\nto hide how much she was smirking.
Kotori and the Kazato sisters had already gone\non ahead of us. So much for solidarity among\nfriends.
Our footsteps echoed into the mellow morning\nair.
My leg was... Well, I had to watch how I\nstepped to avoid setting it off.
Just walking wasn't going to be a problem, but\nI was going to need to avoid any strenuous\nactivity, for today at least.
My first stop was going to be the nurse's\noffice so I could get excused from gym.
Keeping the weight off my affected leg was one\nthing, but I didn't want to put too much of a\nburden on the other side, either.
As soon as I started walking a little\nawkwardly...
\dI got you a cane if you need it.\d
Hotaru scuttled after me and produced a crutch\nfrom under her arm.
\dOr maybe a wheelchair would be better? Ageha\nand I can push you.\d
\dGirls, I can walk just fine. You're blowing\nthis way out of proportion.\d
For once, it didn't seem to cheer her up.
Kotori had no problem getting around campus in\nher chair, so it wasn't like a little pain in\nmy leg would slow me down.
Ageha stopped Hotaru from coming right into\nthe classroom with me.
\dI'm the one who should apologize for her.\d
\dShe's got what you might call an over-active\nsense of responsibility.\d
\dIt's best to grin and bear it until she works\nthrough whatever she's struggling with.\d
\dFeels like it could still go on for a while.\d
\dIf it gets too much, let me know. I'll rein\nher in somehow.\d
\dI don't think it'll get that bad. I'm just\nsorry she feels like she needs to do this in\nthe first place. I'm not hurt that much.\d
\dHer running away sent our parents into a huge\npanic, but part of me can't help but be\nimpressed she actually went through with it.\d
\dI'm usually the one doing crazy stuff and\ngetting into trouble.\d
\dLooks like I lost this round, huh? Haha.\d
\dAnyhow, it's a load off my mind to know this\nthing with your leg is nothing serious.\d
\dJust indulge my stubborn little sister until\nyou fully recover, 'kay?\d
\dBut are you sure about letting her stay at\nthe dorm?\d
\dIt's the first time I've seen her come to a\ndecision and stick with it for this long.\d
Hotaru usually just followed where Ageha and I\nled.
If she was ever unsure, she was the type to\njust follow everyone else.
She always burst into a sunny smile when we\nlet her join in, though.
Looking back on it, I couldn't remember a\nsingle time when Hotaru had been the one to\nsuggest what we should do.
\dJust play along. This might actually be good\nfor her.\d
\dI'll make it worth your while. You prefer a\nmaterial reward or a spiritual one?\d
\dLet's go with something more practical. Put\nyour back into our club activities a little\nmore.\d
\dFine. The things I do for my sister...\d
My morning classes passed by without incident.
During a break, I went to the nurse's office\nand got a new compress and some fresh bandages\nput on my leg.
It wasn't going to get any worse, just as long\nas I didn't do anything extreme, like trying\nto catch a girl who fell from the sky.
\dSo, what's the word? Can you make it to the\nweekend?\d
Piloting a glider didn't require as much\nphysical exertion as riding a bike, so I\ndidn't think it would be a problem.
But a glider wasn't like a land vehicle. In\nthe air, one little mistake could mean the\ndifference between life and death.
Overconfidence was a killer. We really\ncouldn't be careful enough.
\dI got you a list of massage places approved\nby the athletics club.\d
\dThanks. I'll take a look if it doesn't heal\non its own.\d
After school, Hotaru had appeared by my side,\nalmost out of nowhere.
Everyone else went off to club, but I headed\nhome early to rest up.
\dTake care of him for me, Hotaru.\d
\dOkay, but ease up a little. It's what she\nwants, so make the most of it and put her to\ngood use.\d
It felt kinda strange to walk back to the dorm\nwith Hotaru next to me.
I'd known her a lot longer than Kotori and the\nKazatos, so there was no real tension between\nthe two of us.
We didn't speak, but it was by no means an\nuncomfortable silence. This was just the way\nHotaru was.
I wasn't exactly a talkative type either, so\nit was natural enough for us both to stay\nquiet.
\dWhat should I make for dinner tonight...?\d
When I eventually spoke up, Hotaru replied\nright away.
\dSince I've got you here, I was thinking of\ntrying something a little more advanced.\d
\dI can't allow that. You need to take it\neasy.\d
\dI've been walking normally all day, right?\d
\dWhat am I gonna do with you...\d
\dNothing. You don't get to do anything\ntonight.\d
\dWasn't the point of this to make my life\neasier?\d
\dIt will be easier. Just so long as you get\nyour rest.\d
\dJust doing what my sister told me.\d
\dI don't remember her saying anything like\nthat.\d
\dTrust me. No work for you today.\d
\dAre you sure you can cook for a whole\ndorm-full of people on your own?\d
\dReeeally? I don't want you pushing yourself\ntoo hard.\d
\dWhen I first took over, I was so rushed off\nmy feet I just made hotpot every night.\d
\dI can always cast my 'Summon Ageha' spell.\d
\dI'll take over all your chores so you can\nrest and recuperate.\d
\dYou don't have to go that far. Just a little\nhelp here and there is fine.\d
\dSo you really are staying here, huh?\d
\dIt's not like I don't want you here, but...\d
But I couldn't ignore how delicate a situation\nwe had here.
The waiting on me hand-and-foot thing was bad\nenough, but I had to find some way to convince\nHotaru she wasn't responsible for all this.
Maybe I could think it over in the bath after\ndealing with the dinner preparations.
That had been my plan, but...
How did it turn out like this?
I was lying down and Hotaru was massaging my\nbare leg.
She gripped the flesh around my knee and\nstarted to knead it between her fingers.
\dYeah, I'm sure you know what you're doing.\d
\dI asked Mr. Yamazaki over at Windy's to teach\nme.\d
There used to be an orthopedic clinic tucked\naway in one corner of the shopping district.
I'd gone to him before when I'd gotten into an\naccident and dislocated a joint.
\dRight after a bath is the best time to do\nit.\d
When she looked at me with that super-serious\nlook on her face, it was difficult to come\nright out and say what I meant.
\dWhat I'm trying to say is, if you really want\nto do something for me, this isn't what I'd\nchoose.\d
All this time Hotaru had continued to work\naway on my leg.
From my calf, to my knee, and around to the\nback...
\dI heard a massage is good for relieving pain.\nThat's what gave me the idea.\d
I couldn't exactly flat-out refuse her at\nthis point.
She'd probably get tired of it soon enough,\nanyway.
With that, Hotaru returned to her massage.
Hotaru's fingers worked their way across my\nleg.
Her touch was soft and warm.
I was getting a little ticklish. Ironically,\nthis was making me feel more tense...
*squish, squish* Still, this probably was good\nfor my muscles.
Her hands traveled along my skin, stretching\nit here and there, making me more aware of the\njoints and bones underneath.
The sensation was hard to describe, not quite\npainful or ticklish or itchy, but somewhere in\nbetween all that.
Then things took a turn for the awkward.
Hotaru leaned in for a closer grip on me.
Now she was wrapped around my leg. If I moved\neven a little, I was going to bump right\nagainst her chest.
Being this close to a girl was...well...
That shiny hair, the graceful line from her\ncheek to her throat, those delicate\nshoulders...
I don't think I'd ever taken such a long, hard\nlook at Hotaru since coming back to this town.
I'd just considered her the same little girl\nwho always used to trail along behind me and\nher sister.
When I was reunited with Ageha, she seemed\nreally proud of how she'd matured. Physically,\nanyway.
And Hotaru, she wasn't a child anymore,\neither. She'd grown into a fine young woman.
A sudden jolt of pain cut through my\nsentimental train of thought.
\dNo, no... I was, uh... I mean, it wasn't\nreally...\d
In this case, it hadn't been the old injury,\njust my leg seizing up a little from being in\nthe same position for so long.
Hotaru looked downhearted for a moment, but\ncontinued the massage, taking care to move to\na different spot.
Now I was feeling a different kind of pain.
I knew my body well, and I knew this wasn't\ngood.
Putting too much weight on that spot might\nactually do some serious damage.
\dThat right there... That's where the problem\nis.\d
She touched it more gently this time,\ntentatively seeking out just the right spot.
It sent a weird shiver running up my spine.
\dY-yeah, right there... I think that's where\nthe pain's centered.\d
Hotaru's hands tenderly caressed my skin.
She went slowly and carefully, doing her best\nnot to set off any painful spots, her palms\nand fingers exploring all over...
\dUh...you can put a little more force into it\nthere if you want...\d
You could no longer call this a massage. It\nfelt less focused, more intimate...
I began to tremble all over, struggling not to\nthink impure thoughts about sweet, innocent\nHotaru.
I'm sure these desires were perfectly natural\nfor a healthy, red-blooded young man like\nmyself, but this wasn't the time or the place.
Not the way I would have phrased it.
No, no, no. I had to remember this was Hotaru.\nIt wasn't her fault I was reading too much\ninto her words and actions.
I took a deep breath to steady my nerves and\npush back those dirty thoughts.
\dI think maybe it's better like this...\d
I placed my hand over Hotaru's.
I put in just the right amount of pressure.
Hotaru gave out a little squeak with each\nsqueeze.
\dI'd like it if you could keep that up. Is\nthat okay? It won't tire you out or anything,\nwill it?\d
Hotaru looked like she was spacing out.
*squeeze, squeeze* She was putting more power\ninto her massage now.
She continued kneading the flesh of my leg.
I knew Hotaru wasn't as strong as me. She had\nto put a lot of effort into it, and her\nbreathing was getting a little ragged.
Now that I thought about it, seeing Hotaru so\nout of breath was a pretty unusual sight.
Since coming back, I'd never seen her\nphysically exert herself very much.
She never run around with the rest of us, or\nran to avoid being late or stuff like that.
I felt like I was witnessing something that\nwas a secret from the rest of the world.
I'd been struggling for a while now to keep my\nmind out of the gutter.
For her part, Hotaru was starting to flush,\nand her body was getting closer and closer to\nmine...
I instinctively shot out my hand toward my\nphone.
Hotaru took a break and tried to catch her\nbreath.
I hoped I didn't sound too flustered.
\dHey, I forgot to ask earlier. Is it cool if I\ncome over for dinner tonight? Better to let\nyou know sooner rather than later, right?\d
\dDinner? Sure. No problem, Hotaru can help me\nout.\d
\dAnd what are you and Hotaru doing right now?\d
\dHey, wait a minute! What are you suggesting?\d
\dYou trying to tell me you're not doing\nanything at all?\d
\dI meant, like, you could play some video\ngames together or something. What were you\nthinking? Nothing good, I bet!\d
\dAgeha! Don't tease Aoi. He's in a delicate\ncondition.\d
Great, now Hotaru was trying to stand up for--\nWhoa! Her face was so close!
She might have snatched the phone away\ncompletely if I hadn't put it on loudspeaker.
\dOoh, that's why you've been hanging out with\nOld Man Yamazaki so much, huh?\d
\dJust don't overdo it. Remember, you're still\na beginner.\d
\dYou wouldn't want to make it worse. I won't\nlet you come home if you do.\d
\dYou gotta keep this girl in line, Aoi.\d
\dI didn't place her in your midst just for\nfun, you know.\d
\dOkay, but ease up a little. She means well,\nand she's doing her best here.\d
\dYour recovery is what counts. You're the only\none in the club who can fly the glider. We\ncan't afford to lose you.\d
\dI know. Trust me, I'm more concerned about\nthis than anyone.\d
\dBut I trust Hotaru. I know she wouldn't do\nanything to hurt me.\d
\dHotaru, you heard that, right? Don't go\nbetraying that trust.\d
\dYou know what? Maybe I'll grab dinner\nsomewhere else and leave you two alone.\d
\dI think it'd make Dad cry if both of us\ndidn't come home tonight.\d
\dI guess you're right. Make sure you wipe down\nDad's pillow if it's getting wet with tears.\d
Just how emotionally delicate was their dad?
Ageha hung up and the two of us were left in\nsilence.
Hotaru was staring at me intently.
\dI think that's enough massages for one day.\nThanks. Anyhow, I've got dinner to cook, so\nI'd like to get out...\d
\dWhat you said just now...it made me really\nhappy.\d
I patted Hotaru on the head.
\dHey... Maybe you can give me a massage again\nsome other time.\d
Her face lit up into a bright smile.
Hotaru was cute...and so easy to read, too.
Now was the time I'd usually deal with any\nchores I didn't have time for in the morning.
Today Hotaru took charge of the cleaning while\nI sorted through the dorm's mail.
I preferred being on the move; I wasn't used to\nsitting still like this for so long.
\dI'm all done with the first floor. I'll head\nupstairs now.\d
Hotaru shouldered the vacuum and walked up the\nstairs. I watched her go until she was out of\nsight.
Those slender legs of hers were real pretty.
Outwardly, she was completely different from\nthe little Hotaru I'd known before.
I really had to stop thinking of her as a\nlittle kid.
I managed to convince Hotaru to let me help\nmake dinner.
\dI couldn't let you do it all on your own.\nBesides, I'm used to this work.\d
\dHey, this is probably the first time we've\ncooked together, isn't it?\d
No looking away while holding a knife! That's\nan iron-clad law of the kitchen!
I must have made a bad misstep, because right\nthen the old pain flared up again.
I put all my effort into masking the pain.
\dWhat's wrong? You've stopped. You can't let\nyourself get distracted when you have a knife\nin your hand.\d
\dLet's hurry up. Everyone will be home soon.\d
The conversation died after that. We prepared\nthe rest of the meal nearly in complete\nsilence.
Hotaru kept a close eye on me the whole time.
No one was especially surprised to see Hotaru.\nAgeha had told them all about the situation\nalready.
Now this was an uncomfortable silence.
Without Ageha here to take the lead, no one\nreally knew how to approach her.
Hotaru herself was so shy. She spent most of\nher time hiding behind me.
\dOkay, good to see you all. Dinner'll be ready\nin no time at all.\d
Hotaru let out a little sigh of relief. I\npatted her head.
\dYou don't have anything to apologize for.\d
\dI was just thinking, I wish I could be all\nbright and friendly like Ageha...\d
\dAgeha is Ageha. Nothing wrong with being\nyourself.\d
\dNo one's expecting you to be exactly like\nher. Just relax and go with it.\d
My guess was she felt like an outsider, not\nbeing one of the original dorm residents.
\dOh, hi Hotaru. You're looking cute as ever\ntoday!\d
\dHey, Aoi. Could I borrow Hotaru for a while?\d
\dI was thinking she could help me clean up my\nroom a little. She's so good at folding\nstuff.\d
\dJust step this way! It won't take too long.\d
I moved to intercept her, but Kanako stopped\nme with a look.
\dNow, my dear, sweet, Hotaru, come with me.\nI'll treat you real nice!\d
\dI just go weak at the knees for cuties like\nyou. While you're staying here, I'm going to\nenjoy your company to the fullest!\d
Hotaru reached out a hand toward me, begging\nfor help.
It was all in vain. Kanako dragged her away\nand disappeared into her room.
\dEven with Hotaru's help, I didn't find what I\nwas looking for. Too bad, but at least we had\nfun with it.\d
\dThat was so crazy... I feel like I got a peek\ninto a hidden world...\d
\dWhat have you been showing her in there?\d
\dDon't get her interested in any weird stuff.\d
\dYeah, we can't afford any more 'eccentrics'\naround here.\d
\dWhat exactly is that supposed to mean?\d
\dHahaha... I think 'no comment' is the best\nresponse here, right Yoru?\d
\dLooks like I failed to infect her this time.\d
\dShe's too pure to fall for your tricks.\d
\dDoesn't part of you want to see Hotaru in a\nmore...'adult' context, shall we say?\d
\dYou want to see me wear...naughty stuff,\nAoi?\d
\dGeez... Hotaru, come sit with me. We need to\nkeep you away from the rest of these weirdos.\d
\dWe need to put up a buffer between you and\nthem.\d
\dHm? Don't talk like you're one of the\nnormies.\d
\dWhat do you mean by that? I am normal.\d
Kanako and I sat down. On the opposite side of\nthe table were Kotori and the others. All the\nothers.
\dThere's only two of us on this side. Maybe if\nyou fight it out with Kotori, everything will\nbe fine.\d
\dHey, that sounds like fun. Kotori, I\nchallenge you to a duel! Not with swords\nor pistols...\d
\dI don't want you to fight because of me...\d
\dThey're the one at fault here, don't you\nworry about it.\d
\dI don't think you're a pervert, Aoi.\d
That look Kanako gave me earlier... She must\nhave seen how awkward Hotaru was around the\nothers.
This was her way of helping her blend in.
In my mind, I apologized for doubting her.
The next day I suggested Hotaru and I go to\nWindy's after school.
\dYeah. My leg should be fine as long as I take\nit easy.\d
\dWe'll just be walking around and stuff, so it\nwon't be anything strenuous.\d
The two of us sat down on a bench and watched\nthe other students passing by.
\dWhat did you think of your first day at the\ndorm?\d
\dI'm still not used to it... Sorry...\d
Last night Hotaru had looked about ready to\npass out. She was asleep almost the minute her\nhead hit the pillow.
It was a lot to take in. She was away from\nhome, and with so many people around. She must\nhave been exhausted by the end of the day.
\dYou'll get used to it soon enough. People are\nmore adaptable than you give them credit for.\d
\dShe's a special case. Don't measure yourself\nagainst her.\d
\dShe'd probably have fit right in by now...\d
\dOkay, stop right there. No comparing yourself\nto your sister. That's not going to get you\nanywhere.\d
\dAgeha's a completely different person. She\nhas her own way of doing things.\d
\dIt's not like there's a fixed time for\ngetting used to stuff. It's something that\njust happens naturally.\d
\dYou ran away and forced yourself on me\nalready. What happened to all that\nconfidence?\d
\dThat was... I don't know... Somehow, things\nwere different then...\d
\dI still can't believe I actually did all\nthat...\d
\dBelieve it. You can be pretty strong when you\nwant to be.\d
\dI've been thinking this for a while now, but\nyou should try to have a little more\nconfidence in yourself.\d
\dEveryone has their own ideas about what kind\nof people they are, right?\d
\dAfter all, we know our own bodies and their\nlimits better than anyone else.\d
\dBut sometimes a crisis or something can force\nus to do stuff we never thought we'd be able\nto do.\d
\dThat's kinda what happened here, don't you\nthink?\d
\dYou had that confidence all along. You just\nneeded the right circumstances to motivate\nyou.\d
\dYou're capable of doing lots of impressive\nstuff, Hotaru. So have a little more faith in\nyourself.\d
\dLike I keep saying, there's no rush, but\nthink about it, okay? You can try to bring out\nthe best in you a little at a time.\d
\dYeah. Hey, how about we try something new\nright now?\d
\dI know you're probably happy to follow me\nwherever.\d
\dBut how about you pick a place here in\nWindy's that you want to go?\d
\dYeah. Pick anything. We've got plenty of\ntime. Forget about me and think about what you\nwant to do for a change.\d
\dOh, but Flags is out, okay? I'm not made of\nmoney.\d
Cafe Flags served some great food, but it was\nway more expensive than I could afford.
\dApart from that, I'll grant any demand you\nwant to make.\d
\dDoes that mean you didn't really want to come\nhere at all?\d
\dI'm just sayin'. If I came here with Ageha or\nKotori or any of those girls, they'd drag me\naround all kinds of places.\d
\dYou're the only one who'd hold back.\d
\dI don't want to hurry you. Just try to think\nof something before we head home.\d
Hotaru shuffled up a little closer to me.
She rested her head against my arm.
Looking relaxed and content, she closed her\neyes.
Hotaru came closer and rested her whole frame\nagainst me. I could feel the heat of her body.
\dI get to do anything I want...right?\d
\dThis is what I want. I don't really care\nabout shopping or getting stuff to eat.\d
\dI'm not great with places that are busy or\nloud...\d
My pulse was starting to quicken.
It was no longer just Hotaru's body heat... I\nwas getting hot and flustered, too.
This feeling was a little strange...
The way we were just then...felt sort of like\na date.
Like we were boyfriend and girlfriend? I\nguessed that was how we looked.
No... Obviously I liked Hotaru, I cared about\nher a lot. But I'd never thought of her...that\nway before.
Yet here we were, looking very much like we\nwere out on a date.
Anyone passing by would think we were.
We were about the same age, we looked pretty\nhappy together, it was natural they'd think\nthat.
I stiffened up, feeling myself start to sweat.
Well, technically I wasn't actually sweating,\nbut my pulse and breathing were both speeding\nup.
Hotaru didn't move. Obviously she hadn't\nnoticed any change in me.
I couldn't ask her to back up now.
And it wasn't like I wanted her to move away\nfrom me.
Staying like this was just a little\nembarrassing, and the beating of my\nheart was only getting faster.
\dHey, uh... Remember the old days? When this\nplace was still the shopping district?\d
\dWe used to come here a lot.\d
\dDid you actually enjoy it? You didn't just\ncome along because it was where Ageha and I\nwere going, did you?\d
\dOf course I enjoyed it. It was lots of fun.\d
\dYou were always trying to be like Tatsuya,\nand Masatsugu was trying to be like you.\d
\dYeah... Tatsuya seemed really cool to me back\nthen.\d
\dI always thought Ageha was the coolest out of\nall of us, back then. I was pretty jealous of\nher.\d
\dYeah, she was better at sports and stuff than\nthe boys. She had a lot of fans in our class.\d
\d...What did you think of me back then?\d
\dYou were more like a girly-girl to me.\d
\dYou were the princess of the group. We all\ndid our best not to get you into trouble.\d
\dI still can't help wondering if things would\nbe different now if I'd tried to be a little\nmore like Ageha when we were kids.\d
\dHmm... Seeing you with a more sporty look\nwould be interesting, I guess.\d
\dWould you like me better that way?\d
Hotaru wasn't the only one who could fire off\nquick replies.
\dIt'd be kind of a novelty, but it wouldn't be\nthe real you, like you are now.\d
\dI'm much more interested in the person you\nare now, and how you're going to grow and\nchange from here on.\d
Hotaru smiled, nuzzling her face into my arm.
The sudden urge to give her a hug washed over\nme. But this wasn't the time or the place.
\dYou can never really tell what life is going\nto throw at you.\d
\dI never thought I'd come back to this town,\nor get involved in a sport other than\ncycling.\d
But then that accident had forced me to seek\nout something new, which eventually led me to\nthe soaring club.
I never could have seen that coming.
And Hotaru had been even more of a surprise.
Who'd have thought she'd have gotten this\ncute?
She looked up at me as if she'd read my mind.
I could still feel her eyes on me... Like she\ncould see my innermost thoughts laid bare.
Was I blushing? Hopefully I wasn't.
\dI'm soaking up everyone's power through you.\nNot just from the old days, but from Kotori\nand Kanako and the rest, too.\d
\dCool. Okay, soak up as much as you want,\nthen.\d
\dWhat do you want for dinner tonight?\d
\dStill, you must be fine if you're feeling\ngood enough to make jokes.\d
Hotaru shuffled away from me, looking\nrefreshed and confident in a way I'd never\nseen before.
She stood up and twirled around.
Her skirt fanned out and fluttered.
I couldn't help fixating on it. I caught my\nbreath.
\dWhat do you say we go shopping for tonight's\nmeal?\d
All of a sudden, we were holding hands.
It reminded me of the old days.
The days before Windy's, when we used to play\nand hang around in Kazegaura's shopping\ndistrict.
Maybe now our hands were a little bigger. And\nHotaru's were more soft, and slender, and...
\dHow is Dad? How was his pillow?\d
\dIf you're so worried about him, you ought to\ncome home, too.\d
\dI went to the doctor, but they just said to\nwait and see for a little longer.\d
\dMaybe that's for the best. Doesn't look like\nthe weather's gonna be great, anyway.\d
\dOoh, that's your 'I have to do something to\nhelp' face.\d
\dHave it your way. Does that mean you're not\ncoming home?\d
Some kind of wordless communication seemed to\nhave passed between the Himegi sisters.
I got up and checked on my leg.
The doctor had said that it was nothing\nserious enough to need treatment, at least.
The pain was still there, but it came and\nwent.
\dYeah. Wait just a sec, I'm gonna get\ndressed.\d
She nodded and greeted me with a smile.
I smiled too. It felt good to have Hotaru\nhere, I was full of energy now.
Hotaru had really made an effort to change.
It may have been thanks to that morning when\nshe ate breakfast with all the other dorm\nresidents.
\dWe'll be late if we don't leave soon.\d
She helped wake everyone up and get them\nready.
And when we left for school, she seemed really\ntogether.
At school, Hotaru still didn't speak much, but\nshe was much more comfortable hanging out with\neveryone and joining in their conversations.
She hadn't forgotten her self-appointed role\nas my helper, and did everything in her power\nto make things easy on my leg.
Hotaru had even earned Kotori's approval.
That in itself was no small accomplishment.
Then came the day of the big storm.
It wasn't actually a typhoon, but it sure felt\nlike one.
First, I saw Amane for the first time in a\nwhile.
Tatsuya arrived more or less at the same time.
\dSo I saw Amane and tried to call out to her,\nbut she didn't hear, so I ended up following\nher...\d
Then Akari showed up to get some documents\nKanako had been 'meaning to submit' for a\nwhile.
Naturally, Akari brought Masatsugu with her.
\dSince we're all here, why don't we grab a\nbite to eat together?\d
\dYou're an all-girls dorm, right? I'll pass.\d
\dSame here. I feel a little out of place.\d
\dSuit yourselves, but I think it's a waste.\nThe more the merrier, right? What do you\nthink, Aoi?\d
So I ended up playing host to a whole crowd of\npeople.
The kitchen had become a battleground as we\nstruggled to make enough for everyone.
Even with Ageha and Hotaru moving fast enough\nto become little more than blurs, I could see\nwe were going to have trouble.
I wished I could help them, but I didn't want\nto agitate my leg. All I could do was watch.
This sucked... I couldn't help but wonder if\nthere was something I could do.
\dKeeping everyone happy is part of your\nduties, too.\d
\dYou tell him. Just leave this to us, Aoi.\nIt's been ages since you last saw Amane, so go\ndo some catching up.\d
\dTechnically you're my guests, too. I feel bad\nmaking you work while I just sit around.\d
\dOh come on, we practically live here at this\npoint.\d
Reluctantly, I left the kitchen to join the\nothers.
\dI'd heard about this thing with Hotaru, but\nseeing it for myself is just...wow...\d
\dTell me about it. This is probably the first\ntime I've ever seen Hotaru take the lead, in\nanything.\d
\dBut yeah, she's doing really great. She's\nchanged a lot lately.\d
\dMaybe I'll ask Akari what she thinks.\d
\dWhoa, hey, don't do that! Sorry, all right? \d
\dMan, you haven't changed at all. That's kind\nof a relief, though.\d
Time flies when you're having fun. Dinner was\nover before I knew it and everyone went back\nto their own rooms.
\dI need to be here to take care of you.\d
\dNo need to go that far. You must be tired,\ntoo. Go change out of your uniform and take a\nbreak.\d
\dI can't allow that. Your leg's been acting\nup, right?\d
I'd ended up pitching in in the kitchen when\nthings were at their busiest.
Sure enough, it had set off the pain in my\nleg.
So much for taking it easy. I should have\nknown better.
I put out my leg for Hotaru to massage.
She was getting better at this.
Part of it was knowing where the pain was, but\nher technique and her awareness of my limits\nhad improved, too.
\dMmm, yeah, that feels good. Can you keep that\nup?\d
She worked and kneaded at my leg.
\dNo, that's just right. You can't be too\ngentle or it won't work.\d
The pain came and went again and again.
But it wasn't so bad, now that my legs didn't\nhave to support the weight of my body.
It felt like the pain was gradually getting\nshaved down, covering a smaller and smaller\narea.
\dDon't feel like you have to keep this up for\ntoo long. You need to get some rest yourself.\d
There wasn't much I could say to persuade her\nwhen she got this serious.
I sat back for a while longer, the only sound\nin the room that of Hotaru's ragged breathing.
\dYou know... Masa and Tatsuya said this today\ntoo, but you've changed a lot since we were\nkids.\d
\dEspecially in the last few days. It's really\nimpressive.\d
\dIf that's really the case...then I owe it all\nto you, Aoi.\d
\dHey, I can't take all the credit. I just gave\nyou a push in the right direction.\d
\dIt's like when you water plants to get\nflowers.\d
\dThe water helps, but the potential to grow is\nin the plant the whole time.\d
\dYou always had it in you to grow like this.\nTake some pride in that.\d
\dThat said, I think you were plenty 'charming'\nthe way you were, too.\d
\dNot that I'm wishing you didn't make an\neffort to change or anything. How do I put\nthis...\d
\dI think you're cute now, and you always have\nbeen, too.\d
\dYou've really grown up, and it's surprising\nhow different you are now.\d
Hotaru's hands came to a stop.
She looked me dead in the eye. My heart\nstarted to pound.
\dI can't just go around patting your head all\nthe time anymore.\d
\dIn fact, I think you should. You can't stop\ndoing it now.\d
Faced with that passionate gaze, I wasn't sure\nhow to react.
We took a break from the massage session. I\nreached out my hand to Hotaru's head.
I realized it'd be awkward to stay in my\ncurrent posture, and tried to lean forward a\nlittle.
The knee Hotaru had been massaging came\nforward with me, and then...
I quickly pulled my leg away.
My arms started windmilling around as I tried\nto regain my balance and not fall backwards.
Hotaru reached out and grabbed my arm and\nhelped steady me.
Then we just kind of looked at each other.
Hotaru's eyes were glistening with moisture.
Her hand was slightly sweaty, and just as warm\nas the intense gaze she'd turned on me.
\dEver since we were little, I've always...\d
\dI-I mean, when you moved away...it was like\nmy whole world went dark...\d
I could see tears forming in the corners of\nher eyes. Her voice was shaking, like she was\nhaving trouble forcing the words out.
\dThen this stuff with your leg happened. I\nwas so scared... Scared you might go away\nagain, forever this time!\d
\dWhat, like I'd have to go to the hospital or\ndo a rehab program or something?\d
\dI wanted to do something, anything to help,\neven if only a little...\d
\dAnd I also thought, it'd be nice to spend\nevery day with you...\d
I just knew I was blushing now, and I was so\nwarm you could fry an egg on my forehead.
\dYou're...the most important person in the\nwhole world to me.\d
Overwhelmed by what she'd said, Hotaru started\nto freak out and fell forward.
I caught her in my arms.
She was still conscious, but she was acting\nall spacey, like she might collapse again any\nmoment.
\dI... I want to be with you.\d
\dIf you already have a girlfriend or someone\nyou like, I know there's nothing I can do\nabout that. I won't stand in your way.\d
\dIt may be a little hard for me...\d
\dBut I really just want to stay by your side,\nalways... Can I...?\d
Hotaru had always been focused on me.
Not Tatsuya, not Masatsugu, but me.
It's not like I hadn't noticed.
But I always thought she just looked up to me\nas a big brother figure.
And I'd thought of her like a little sister.
Or at least, I assumed this was how it would\nfeel to have a younger sister.
Hotaru's feelings toward me weren't purely\nplatonic after all.
They were something different, and quite\npossibly stronger.
Hence why she went so far as to move in with\nme the moment I got hurt.
For a girl who was usually so shy and\nretiring, that must have taken an incredible\namount of courage.
That was just how much Hotaru cared about me,\nI guess.
Here I'd been, living under the same roof with\nher, and I'd only just noticed.
But I knew how she felt now.
She didn't see me as a brother... She liked me\nin a different way.
And what about me? How did I feel about her?
Did I feel bad, knowing she felt that way\nabout me? No...
Did I want her to stop feeling that way? No...
Did I still think of her as a sister?
I wasn't sure exactly when things had changed.
Maybe it was while she was massaging my leg,\nand I started thinking about how much she'd\nchanged.
Maybe it was when her face was so close to\nmine and I started noticing how elegant her\nfeatures were.
Or maybe...maybe it was when I first came back\nto this town and met her at her family's\nstore.
Maybe she wasn't a sporty, talkative kind of\ngirl. Chatting and having a good time with\nothers didn't come naturally to her.
But I always enjoyed the time I spent with\nher.
Even when the conversation got a little\nstilted, it was fun just being around her.
Like that time on the bench. We didn't need\nwords.
It might have looked boring to other people,\nbut for me it was a nice, simple memory.
It was peaceful. When I was with Hotaru, I\ncould relax.
And knowing now how she felt about me, that\nshe had this much passion inside her...
And I wanted to do my best to live up to her\nfeelings, no longer as a brother-like figure,\nbut as a man.
I cradled Hotaru's cheek in the palm of my\nhand.
\dYeah...you can stay by my side. Or, actually,\nit's more like... I want to be with you, too.\d
\dLet's do it, let's stay together. You and me,\nforever. Or as much as we can, at least.\d
Hotaru's eyes were wide open now, unleashing\nall the tears she'd been holding back.
I couldn't just watch and let her slump to the\nfloor.
I brought my face close to hers and licked her\ncheek.
But the next moment, she'd reached out and put\nher hand on mine.
「頭じゃないところ……なでても……いいよ……」
ほたるの目から、視線が動く。
つややかな唇に。なめらかな頬に。
まるい肩に。細い腕に。ふくらむ胸に。腰に。
妹じゃなく、女の子を――彼女を見る目を向ける。
「あおにぃになら……どこ……なでられても……いいから……」
言葉と一緒に、ほたるの手がどんどん熱を帯び、顔色もゆであがったような色合いになっていく。
ほたるが、俺の手を引いて、自分の体に触れさせた。
俺も、ほたるの腰に手を回した。
唇が、熱くて甘い感触でいっぱいになる。
すごくいい。なんだこれ。こんなに。
ほたるの体温が急上昇するのがはっきりわかる。
唇をさらに押しつける。
弾力と、熱と、甘さと――衝撃。
経験したことのない、痺れる、いやとろけるような、快感がはしった。
頭の奥の方で、白いものがふくれあがって、全身に満ちて、幸せだけになる。
なんだよこれ。なんなんだ。なんでこんなに気持ちいいんだ。
女の子の唇って、どうして、こんなに、甘いんだよ……。
ほたるも、くぐもった声で、何度もうめく。
その声ひとつひとつが、俺の耳を叩き、体をさらに熱くする。
唇をこすり合わせながら、ほたるの体に、さらに強く腕を回す。
ほたるも、俺にしがみついてくる。
唇を、何度も何度も押しつけ、触れさせながら……。
その手が、俺の服をめくり、素肌に触れてきた。
熱い手に触れられて、ぞわっと、ものすごい感覚がはしって。
俺の脳内でも、何かがぷつっと切れた。
唇をくっつけ、密着し、こすり、ぬめぬめとさせながら、俺もまた、ほたるの体に回した手をうごめかせる。
服の下にある、熱い素肌を、手の平に感じる。
意識しただけで、脳天からぽーんとフタが飛びそうな勢いで、体の中が熱くなる。
からだ……女の子の体が、この布地の下にある。
ほたるが、俺の服をはだけながら、俺の手に体を押しつけてくる。
同じようにして、という強いメッセージ。
だから、俺も、ほたるの服を脱がせてゆく。
ほたるは体を動かし、俺が脱がせやすいように協力してくれた。
「ちゅっ、んっ、ちゅっ、ちゅっ、ちゅ、ちゅ、ちゅ……」
唇を何度も何度も触れあわせ、こすりつけ、重ね合わせながら、ほたると俺は、着ているものをはだけてゆく。
唇を離した時、ほたるはもう、寝入る寸前のようにまぶたを垂れ下げて、息ばかりを激しく乱していた。
きっと俺も、同じような状態。
お互い、名前を呼び合い、また唇を触れさせて、服をはだけて。
「そっちじゃなくて、きれいになったって」
ほたるは、俺がはだけた服を、自分で、さらに大きくはだけ……。
白い体に食いこむようなブラジャーを、背中に手を回して、自分で外した。
カップが離れて、少しだけ重力に引かれて、ふたつのふくらみがあらわになる。
ふくらみ。もりあがり。双丘。乳房。……おっぱい。
ほたるの胸には、大人の女性そのもの、俺の男性部分が強烈に反応してやまない隆起が、あわやかに息づいていた。
肩から胸への曲線、もりあがる曲面。そのすべてが、俺を引きつけ、魅惑して、離さない。
トレーニングは続けているから、たるんではいない。
そこに、ほたるが手を這わせ、なで回してくる。
腹筋を、あばらを、胸筋を、乳首を、小さく熱い手で愛撫され、ぞわぞわ、ぞくぞく、くすぐったさと快感が入り交じった感覚が駆け上がってくる。
この上なく甘いしびれに悶えながら、俺もまた、同じようにほたるの体に手を這わせる。
なめらかで、それでいて吸いつくような肌。
俺の手の動きに合わせて、ほたるもまた、声を漏らし、切なげに眉を寄せて悶える。
手の中に、ふくらみを包みこんだ。
手の平いっぱいに広がる、ほたるの胸。
甘い声に、俺の脳が震える。
手の平からの感覚に、意識が埋め尽くされる。
やわらかくて、硬く突き出した部分があって、それが手の平でこすれてくすぐったくて、気持ちよくて。
その感覚だけで、股間が危険なくらいに膨張して、一気に破裂しそうになる。
ほたるの声は小さいが、徐々にトーンが上がってくる。
その響きに、俺はますます興奮し、止まれなくなった。
さらにほたるの服を脱がせ、俺もまた脱いでいく。
お互い、相手の体に触れ、まさぐり、撫で……。
俺のモノをあらわにすると、ほたるは目をみはった。
俺は、ほたるの腰に手をやった。
ほたるも協力して、そこを覆う、可愛い下着を脱がせる。
両脚の間に、縦にはしる、肉の割れ目。
ほたるが、そこをのぞきこもうとする俺を遮って、しがみついてきた。
俺はその体を受け止め、横たえた。
顔と顔とが近づいて、当たり前のように、キス。
どちらも裸になって、体をくっつけながらするキスって……すごい。
唇が触れるたびに、鳥肌が立つ。
股間に電流が流れ、それまで以上に熱く張り詰める。
「んんっ、んっ……んっ……ちゅ……ん……れろっ」
ぬるっと、口の中に熱いものが生まれた。
その瞬間、さっき一番最初にキスした瞬間以上の、白い爆発が起こった。
舌だ、ほたるに、舐められた。
すごい……舌って、こんなに……甘くて、おいしくて、気持ちいいんだ……。
「れろ、ちゅ、ちゅ、ちゅぷ、れろ、ぴちゃ……」
俺たちは夢中になって舌を絡め合った。
快感に体が震え、重ね合った素肌と素肌がこすれ合って、それもまたすごい気持ちよさ。
ほたるの体、細くて、熱くて、どこもかしこもやわらかくて、いい匂いがして。
「あおにぃ、からだ、すごく、熱い……おっきい……」
ほたるも、俺にしがみつき、体をこすりつけてくる。
もぞもぞと、俺たちは蛇のように、お互いの体を体で味わう。
そして、そうしていると、否応なく、それぞれの持っているものの違いがはっきりしてくる。
ほたるの胸には、男の俺にはないふくらみがある。
俺の胸には、ほたるには望むべくもない、厚い筋肉がある。
ほたるの両脚の間には――何もない。
俺の両脚の間には、骨みたいに硬くそそり立ったモノが。
俺の体を這い回るほたるの手が、そこに触れる。
目をみはり、のぞきこんで、愕然とする。
「太い……硬い……こんなに……これ……痛くないの？」
「い、いや、痛くないし、むしろ……うっ！」
ほたるの指が、先端に触れて、あふれてくる粘液を軽くいじって周囲に広げる。
そ、そうされると、刺激が、快感が、すごいことに……！
「そ、そりゃ……気持ちいいから……ほたるだって」
俺も、ほたるのそこに手を伸ばした。
触れていた膝から、すべすべする太ももを這い上がっていって、つけ根のところにわずかにできている逆三角形の空間に。
そして、股間そのものに、手をあてがう。
何もない。外に出ている突起、男ならあるべき盛り上がりがない……というのが、すごく変な感じ。
そこにあるのは、熱い割れ目……手の平にはっきりわかる、熱を帯びた縦のスジ。
ぷっくり盛り上がっているのは、多分これが、陰唇ってやつ。
ひときわ熱いのはその間で、そこに指で触れただけで、ぬるりと、グリースよりもっとぬめる、火傷しそうな高温の汁が。
ほたるが強い声をあげ、脚閉じようとした。
俺の手が太ももにはさまれるけど――これ、かえって気持ちいいなあ。
その状態で、指先をうごめかせ、熱い汁の湧いてくる部分に潜りこませて、探る。
ほたるの体がぎゅっとなり、息を止めて震えた。
「い、いや、そんなこと、ない……恥ずかしい……だけ……」
見ているわけじゃないので、正直、どこがどこやらって感じだけど、はっきりしてるのは、触るだけでもやばいくらい気持ちいいってこと。
ぬるぬるして、弾力あって、複雑な作りしてて、隅から隅まで確かめてみたくなる。
「ん、んっ、んっ…………くっ……や……んっ、ふぅっ……！」
ほたるは息を詰まらせ、ぎゅっと俺にしがみついて震える。
ほたるが強く反応するところを、集中的に刺激してみる。
「ん、ふ、ん！　ん！　あ、あ！　だめ……っ……や、んっ、だめ、そこ、あ……！」
指先に、新しい熱を感じた。
内側からとろとろあふれてくる。
それが出てくる場所に、指を進めた。
ぬぷっと、指が、埋まった。
ほたるがギュッと体を硬くする。
ここだな……思ってたより下だった。
耳にささやくと、ほたるは俺の胸元に頭をぶつけるようにして、小さくうなずいた。
俺はゆっくり、その穴の回りに指を這わせて、じわじわと内側に侵入していった。
指の動きに合わせて、ほたるが小さくうめき、震えるのに、強く興奮してしまう。
「ん……うん……あ、あおにぃの……いれるの……」
入り口まわりを触るだけだと、けっこうきつそうだけど、大丈夫なのかな。
指を二本使って、開いてみた。
力を入れて、じわじわ、開いていった。
ほたるの肌が一気に火照り、泣き顔になって俺にしがみついてくる。
入り口が、完全に開いた。
ほたるが涙目でうなずいた。
腰を動かし、強く張り詰めてる先端を、そこにあてがう。
ぬるっと、先っぽに粘液が広がった。
うわ……これだけでも、すごく気持ちいい。
角度が違うのか、肉棒がすべった。
ほたるが、強くびくっとする。
もう一度、今度は慎重に、ほたるの割れ目の上にペニスを置いて、動かしてみた。
ぬるぬるする、やわらかいヒダとは別に、小さなとっかかりというかポッチというか、何かがある。
「ん！　んっ！　んっ！　あっ、そ、それっ、やっ、んっ！」
ほたるの声が明らかに変化した。
「んっ、び、びくって、なっちゃう……変に、なりそう……」
腰を動かし、ずり、ず～り、ずにゅっと、その部分にペニスを押しつけ、往復させた。
ぬるつく感覚に夢中になりつつ、名前を呼ぶ。
上ずり、裏返る声が、可愛すぎる。
ぬるぬる擦り続けると、ほたるはますます悶え、体を熱くして……。
俺の方も、ペニスが擦れて、快感が強まって、それ以上のものが欲しくて、我慢できなくなってきた。
ほたるの熱い部分が、はっきりペニスで感じられる。
そこに、腰を大きく引いて、先端をあてがった。
俺は、握って、その場所に先端をあてがった。
ほたるが強く息をのみ、体を硬くする。
俺は、ひとつ、大きく息を吸って……腰に力をこめた。
亀頭に、これまでの比じゃない熱をおぼえる。
ほたるがぐっと歯を食いしばり、俺も全神経を股間に集中して、燃えるようなその場所に、力を入れて、入りこむ……！
濡れてるけど、き、きつい……そのきつい所に、亀頭が擦れて、未経験の快感で、じりじりと押し広げながら侵入し……。
ある所で、ずぶりと、埋まった。
ほたるが、全身硬直させて、苦しげにもがいた。
ペニスが、奥へ――ほたるの内側へ、入っていく！
す、すごいぞ、本当に、入る、体の中に、入って！
ものすごいきつさ、でもぬるぬるで、腰に力を入れるとじりじりとさらに奥へ入っていく。
亀頭全部が、熱いものに包みこまれ、締めつけられる。
経験したことのない感覚。
気持ちよすぎる……これが、女の子の、なか！
でも、気がつけば、俺の腕の中で、ほたるが苦悶していた。
動きを止め、じっとする。
ほたるは必死に息をつき、痛みに耐え続ける。
「あおにぃの、なら……平気……うれしい、から……」
健気に笑おうとしてくれる、その頬に手をあてがい、なでさすった。
「痛くしちゃって、ごめんな。もう少しだから」
「大丈夫、だよ……したいように、して……」
涙目で言ってくれる、この子のことが、今までより大好きになった。
俺のすべてで、包みこみたい。
この子と、ひとつになりたい。
額にキスして、ゆっくり、腰を動かした。
歯をくいしばり、かなり痛そう。
悪いと思いつつも、抜いてゆく時のその刺激がすごくって、こちらはぞぞぞっと鳥肌を立てる。
そのまま、また入りこむ。
大きく息をつき、ちらりと視線を下に向けた。
「お腹……いっぱい…………沢山、入ってる……」
「そうだな……こんなに、入るなんて……」
正直な感想だった。想像してたよりずっと穴が深くって、どこまでもほたるの中に埋まっていってしまいそう、とさえ思う。
そのまま、ゆっくり、動き続ける。
ほたるが痛がっているので、こっちも少し気持ちが落ちついて、動かしやすい感じになっていた。
熱い穴を、往復し続ける。
抜いて、入りこんで、抜いて、入れて。
「んっ、んっ、ん……ん……んっ、ふっ、んっ、ん……」
ほたるは、俺にしがみついて、往復される苦痛にひたすら耐えている。
ぬめぬめ、穴はよく濡れていて、抜き差しそのものには痛みがなさそうなのが救いだ。
濡れてないのに無理矢理入れて、女性はもちろん、男の方も切れてしまったなんて怖い話も聞いたことあるからな。
「んっ……く……んっ……ん、あ……ん……んっ、ふっ……」
「ちょっと……だんだん、平気に……なって……きた……」
その体を、あらためて、抱きしめる。
俺は初体験の興奮に、かなり体が熱くなっている。
でも、ほたるの細い裸身は、それ以上に熱かった。
胸板を重ね、おっぱいを軽くこする。
俺はおっぱいに手をやり、包みこんで、揉みしだいた。
「んんっ、ふあっ、やっ、それ、ぞくぞくするぅ……」
乳首を優しくつまみ、転がしながら、腰を動かした。
それまでと反応が変わった。
乳首を刺激し、ほたるが声を漏らすたびに、ぴくっと、ほたるのその部分がわずかに震える。
動きを止めてじっとしていると、それがよくわかり……。
「んん、ふぅ……ん……ん、ふぁ……あ……ちゅ……ちゅぷ……」
乳首をいじりながら、キスすると、さらに顕著になった。
「ちゅぱ、ちゅぷ、ちゅ、ぴちゃ、ぴちゃ、ぴちゃ、くちゅ……」
舌と舌をふれあわせ、軽くこすり合わせながら、腰も同じタイミングで小さく動かす。
すると、ほたるはまぶたを震わせ、まったく違う声を漏らし始めた。
甘い――まぎれもない快感の声。
本能的に俺の耳はそれを聞き取った。
「んっ、あおにぃ……なんか……なんか、よ、よく、熱く……\n　気持ちよく、なって、きた……」
さっきまで痛みに寄っていたほたるの眉が、開いて、うっとりした瞳を俺に向けてくる。
「あぁ……まだ、痛い、けど、もっと、おっきく……あ……\n　熱い、のが……体、ふわって……んっ、なる……」
ほたるがより強く反応する方法を探して、俺は色々腰を動かした。
「んっ、はっ、あんっ！　そ、そこ……それ……！」
「それっ、そこ、あ、こすれると、ふわって、強く、あ、あ、\n　あ、はあっ、あんっ……ん！」
ほたるがいきなり、俺の胸板に顔を埋めた。
「み、みっともない顔、しそう……声も……！」
優しくいいつつ、強引にあごを持ち上げさせた。
「気持ちよくなってくれたのなら、嬉しいから……そのまま、\n　エッチになった顔、見せて」
顔を下げられないようにしてから、腰を動かした。
ほたるは恥ずかしがって、真面目な顔をしようとする。
でも、その目がすぐ閉じられ、口が強く引き結ばれ……。
内側を、俺が、ずりゅっ、ずちゅっと、粘液の音を立てて往復する。
名前を呼び、軽くキスして、乳首をこすりながら腰を動かす。
俺の快感も強くなって、息づかいは荒く、動きもつい荒々しくなりそうなのをなんとか抑えつつ……。
「ううっ、うっ、い、いじわる、あおにぃ……いじわる」
涙目で言われると、かえって股間が硬くなった。
「うあっ、お、おっきい、あ、あ、あ、あっ、はあん……ん！」
ぐにゃっと、ほたるの口元が歪んだ。
目尻も落ち、目の焦点が怪しくなる。
頬がひくつき、歪んだ唇の端からよだれが垂れた。
それを舐めとり、腰の動きを激しくする。
「んんんっ、ひっ、んぅ、う、うう、うあ、あ、あひ、\n　う、うぅ、あぁ、あぁぁ、ああ……！」
「ふっ、ふっ、ふっ、ほたる、んっ、ほたるっ」
俺も、快感と興奮とで、年長とか先輩とかそういう外面を放り捨て、一人の男、オスとして、情欲をそのまま顔に出す。
「いいよ、ほたる、気持ちいい、ふっ、ふっ、なかっ、\n　熱くてっ、すごく、たまん、ないっ！」
生の俺の顔を向けられたほたるもまた、目を涙にきらめかせ、見たことのない、感情丸出しの表情をした。
「も、もう……らめ……あ……にぃ……うあ、あ……\n　ああ……あ……！」
熱いものがこみあげてきて、まともにものを考えられなくなってきた。
すごく気持ちいい。もっと動かす。もっとこすり、出す。頭の中がそれだけになる。
「んひぃ、ひぃ、ひっ、くっ、う、う、あ、あ、あ……！」
「ふっ、うっ、くっ、で、出る、出るっ！」
灼熱の塊が、腰の奥から突き上げてきて、ほたるの中で爆発した。
ペニスが、いや腰全体が脈打ち、震える。
とてつもない快感が、俺の体からほたるへと流れ出てゆく。
ほたるもまた、全身がちがちに硬直させ、震えた。
びくっ、びくっと、俺と一緒になって痙攣する。
俺のものを包みこみ受け入れる穴が、しぼりとるように強く吸いついてくる。
そのまま……二人、抱き合って、なお続く震えに身をまかせつつ、底なしの快感に酔いしれた。
「はっ、はっ……はっ……はぁっ……はふぅ……」
どのくらい、何もわからなくなっていたんだろう……。
少しずつ、頭が元に戻ってきた。
強い快感こそ過ぎ去ったものの、胸のうちに、幸せな気持ちがいっぱいに満ちている。
ほたるが、体をすり寄せてきた。
力を失って、俺のものは、外に出ていた。
薄まってはいるが、赤いものがこびりついていて、シーツにも少し垂れていそうだった。
「じんじんして……おっきいのが、入ったまま、みたい……」
「痛かっただろ。よく我慢してくれたな。ありがとう」
抱きかかえて、頭をなでた。
「それに……すごかった……あおにぃ、熱くて……\n　格好よくて……」
ちゅっ、と小さくキスされた。
「今までより、もっと、何百倍も、好きになっちゃった」
言ってから、笑顔のまま真っ赤になって、布団に潜りこもうとする。
その頭をはさみこんで、顔をこっちに向けさせ――。
容赦ない、舌つきのキスをしてやった。
「ん、ん……れろ……ん、ちゅぱ、ちゅ、ちゅっ、ぴちゃ、\n　ちゅ、ちゅぷ、ちゅ……」
ほたるの体温がまた一気に上がり、手足が震え――そしてだんだん、抵抗が薄れて、目も口も、どこもかしこもだらりとなってゆく。
「れろれろれろれろ……ちゅるぅ……はふぅ」
ほたるの舌を、口をすぼめて吸いながら、唇を離していった。
最後に、尖ったほたるの舌先から、唾液の糸が伸びた。
順番が逆になったけど――こういうのは、男の方から言うべきだろう。
もちろん、他の返事があるわけなかった。
俺たちはまた抱き合って、深いキスを交わした。
